1370: Ghisebrecht was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1370.
Got married to Scilla at age 37 in 1370.
Had a son with Scilla, Gelmarus, at age 37.
1371: Had a son with Scilla, Franco, at age 38.
1373: Had a daughter with Scilla, Uergina, at age 40.
1375: Had a daughter with Scilla, Esa, at age 42.
Lost son Gelmarus when Gelmarus was 6 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Scilla, Aleydis, at age 45.
1379: Had a son with Scilla, Jonghen, at age 46.
1380: Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 3 years old.
1381: Lost son Jonghen when Jonghen was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
